en: Lower your knees, chin, and chest.

ru: Колени пододвиньте вперед, чтобы в пояснице образовался прогиб.
en: Slide your knees forward to create an arch in your back.

enSynonyms: Posture with eight points of contact.
Pose with eight points touching the ground.
Pose with eight body points in contact with the ground.
The posture with eight points of contact.
Align your body in eight points on the floor.
Form the eight-point position with your body.
Achieve the eight-point alignment in your pose.
